overview: The brothers Alfonso and Antonio Montero are the greatest in the world of bullfighting. But a terrible catch in a strange mistake by Alfonso ends his life. Antonio decides that he does not want to go back to fighting without his brother and will end up discovering that the mafia that controls the bullfighting show in his city hides atrocious secrets beyond the burladero. Antonio Montero...it's time to finish off the job, cut off both ears and the tail!
title: Maestro Montero
